column1: Make [Thumbor](https://github.com/thumbor/thumbor) urls short and sweet by keeping common

Ever felt your inner perfectionist crying when looking at the Thumbor urls? Want to nominate Thumbor for the Guinness World Record for having the longest urls in the universe? So did I. Meet thumbor-presets - a tiny add-on to keep your most common sizes
column2: filters and settings right in the Thumbor's config.

column1: Install this package via PyPi or GitHub:
Add your common presets to your Thumbor config file:
Start a Thumbor instance with a presets-aware app:
And you're done! Access your presets the easy way:
* The excellent [thumbor-community/shortener](https://github.com/thumbor-community/shortener) extension also allows you to shorten your urls
